name: Sal’s Sublime Sundae
description:
Sal's Sublime Sundae

Making an ice cream sundae should be easy, right? Not for Sal! When a customer orders his off-menu delicacy, he is taken to a mysterious world to find the three remaining key ingredients to his Sublime Sundae.

Features
  • A Metroidvania-lite experience
  • 3 unique areas to explore
  • 3 abilities to find
  • 6 health upgrades to collect
  • Autosaving
  • Monkeys, Crocs, and Yaks!
